discourse_list.title: Poll request for mip65 surplus return to sb

content.content: POLL REQUEST FOR MIP65 SURPLUS RETURN TO SB References MIP65 MIP65 DOCUMENTATION HQ MIP65 QUARTERLY PROCESS MIP65 QUARTERLY PROCESS - EXCESS RETURN SPREADSHEET MIP65 RESOLUTION TEMPLATE Summary -Poll request to return surplus funds from the MIP65 Clydesdale structure to the Surplus Buffer. -Based on data from the Excess Return Spreadsheet, updated on 08-March-23; Sell 8,540 IB01 & 73,486 IBTA and transfer generated funds to the Surplus Buffer. Note: This poll request is being submitted in time to allow for , if successful , inclusion of the resolution in the last executive of the quarter. Motivations -Fulfillment of requirement to return MIP65 Surplus to the SB on a quarterly basis. -Ensure liquidation process functions as designed. -Identify further areas for automation in the liquidation process. Completed Resolution Form IPFS Link for Resolution Q123 cc: @Aes  - Can you please review for push to a poll.
content.GPT-summary: The author of the post is requesting feedback on a poll request to return surplus funds from the MIP65 Clydesdale structure to the Surplus Buffer. The post includes references to relevant documentation and motivations for the request. The author also requests a review for push to a poll. The post does not fit into more than one category.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is asking for feedback

content.content: I think this should be a monthly or a quarterly recurring thing. Any value above the approved DC should be liquidated and returned to the SB. Yes this does incur transaction costs but otherwise we are not adhering to the set risk parameters, Maker also risk getting into a liquidity deficiency as the revenue generated from MIP-65 constitutes a significant portion of Maker’s revenue.
GPT-discussion-categories: 3rd party giving constructive criticism of proposal
